description: EML is the file extension of the Outlook Express Saved Mail Messages files. It belongs to the Microsoft's family of email management programs and it is used for emails saving and forwarding purposes.
name: Email (Electronic Mail Format)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">eml</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
